ModMetaData.name: Follow Me
ModMetaData.author: Fluffy

descriptionsByVersion.v1.0:
Gives the camera tracking capabilities.
&lt;size=24&gt;Features&lt;/size&gt; Press the ‘Home’ key (default, can be changed with in-game keybinding settings) while any colonist, enemy, animal or item is selected, and the camera will follow them (including furniture and plants - but they tend to not move much). Alternatively, you can click with the middle mouse button on colonists in the Colonist Bar on top of the screen to toggle following.
&lt;b&gt;Does not require a new save game&lt;/b&gt; Can safely be enabled/disabled in ongoing saves.
&lt;size=24&gt;Contributors&lt;/size&gt;
SkullyWag: Help with/nagging about updates Raccoon: German translation AlexSchrod: Screen edge &amp; Camera jump detection duduluu: Chinese translations Proxyer: Japanese Translation Oleksii Bespalov: Fix bug in settings persistance Jorge Martínez: Spanish translations Kroeze:
&lt;size=24&gt;Version&lt;/size&gt; This is version 3.5.76, for RimWorld 1.0.2282.
